summary.para: Find the first matching section to appear within the configured timeout.
Sections are identified by the text of their child heading element, or by id.

Search results

...

Search results

...
use this:

member.param: The text of a child heading element or section id

member.name: M:Coypu.Scope.FindFieldset(System.String,Coypu.Options)

summary.para: Find the first matching fieldset to appear within the configured timeout.
Fieldsets are identified by the text of their child legend element, or by id.

E.g. to find this:
<fieldset> <legend>Advanced search</legend> ... </fieldset>
use this:

member.param: The text of a child legend element or fieldset id

param.name: options
param.para: Override the way Coypu is configured to find elements for this call only.
E.g. A longer wait:

member.name: M:Coypu.Scope.FindFrame(System.String,Coypu.Options)

summary.para: Find the first matching frame or iframe to appear within the configured timeout.
Frames are identified by the their id, name or title attributes, by their loaded page title, or by the text of the <h1> element in their content.
E.g. to find this:

use one of these:
Findframe("myFrame") Findframe("My I Frame") Findframe("My Frame Header")

member.param: The text of a child legend element or fieldset id

param.name: options
param.para: Override the way Coypu is configured to find elements for this call only.
E.g. A longer wait:

member.name: M:Coypu.Scope.TryUntil(System.Action,System.Func{System.Boolean},System.TimeSpan,Coypu.Options)

summary.para: Execute an action repeatedly until a condition is met.
Allows the time specified in for the condition to be met before each retry.
Once the is passed a Coypu.MissingHtmlException will be thrown.

member.param: How long to wait for the condition to be met before retrying

param.name: options
param.para: Override the way Coypu is configured to find elements for this call only.
E.g. A longer wait:

member.exception: Thrown if the until condition is never met

member.name: T:Coypu.SessionConfiguration
member.summary: Global configuration settings

member.name: T:Coypu.Options
member.summary: Options for how Coypu interacts with the browser.

member.name: M:Coypu.Options.#ctor
member.summary: New default options

summary.para: When retrying, how long to wait for elements to appear or actions to complete without error.
Default: 1sec
How long to wait between retries
Default: 100ms
How long to wait between finding an element and clicking it.
Default: zero
By default Coypu will exclude any invisible elements, this allows you to override that behaviour
Default: true

member.name: M:Coypu.SessionConfiguration.#ctor
member.summary: New default configuration

summary.para: Specifies the browser you would like to control
Default: Firefox
Specifies the driver you would like to use to control the browser
Default: SeleniumWebDriver
The host of the website you are testing, e.g. 'github.com'
Default: localhost
The port of the website you are testing
Default: 80
Whether to use the HTTPS protocol to connect to website you are testing
Default: false

member.name: T:Coypu.Drivers.Browser
member.summary: The browser that will be used by your chosen driver

member.name: T:Coypu.Drivers.BrowserNotSupportedException
member.summary: Thrown when your chosen browser is not supported by your chosen driver

member.name: T:Coypu.Drivers.XPath
member.summary: Helper for formatting XPath queries

summary.para: Format an XPath query that uses string values for comparison that may contain single or double quotes
Wraps the string in the appropriate quotes or uses concat() to separate them if both are present.
Usage:

member.name: T:Coypu.SnapshotElementScope
member.summary:
The scope of an element already found in the document, therefore not deferred.
If this element becomes stale then using this scope will not try to refind the element but will raise a MissingHtmlException immediately.

member.summary: Supply a value for the text field
member.exception: Thrown if the element cannot be found
